description: Create a new invite link for a conversation

main.description: Create an invite link with optional PSK hash, expiration, and usage limits. Only admins can create invites.

pskHash.description: SHA-256 hash of the pre-shared key (hex-encoded). Used to verify invite link authenticity without exposing PSK.

targetDid.description: Optional DID restriction - invite can only be used by this specific DID

expiresAt.description: Optional expiration timestamp. Invite becomes invalid after this time.

maxUses.description: Optional maximum number of times this invite can be used. Defaults to unlimited.

errors.name: Unauthorized
errors.description: Caller is not an admin of this conversation

errors.name: InvalidPSKHash
errors.description: PSK hash is invalid or malformed

errors.name: NotMember
errors.description: Caller is not a member of this conversation

inviteView.description: View of a conversation invite with usage tracking

createdBy.description: DID of admin who created this invite

pskHash.description: SHA-256 hash of the pre-shared key (hex-encoded)

targetDid.description: Optional DID restriction - invite can only be used by this specific DID

useCount.description: Number of times this invite has been used

isRevoked.description: Whether this invite has been revoked

revokedAt.description: Timestamp when invite was revoked (if applicable)

revokedBy.description: DID of admin who revoked this invite (if applicable)
